transparency.title: Transparency Statement
transparency.dataSourcesText: The fundraising figures displayed on this platform are sourced from:
transparency.dataSourceMOHW: Publicly disclosed reports from the Ministry of Health and Welfare (MOHW)
transparency.dataSourceAssoc: Public disclosures published by participating associations
transparency.dataSourceAnnual: Official annual reports from conservation organizations
transparency.dataWarning: Important: This data may not reflect real-time donation status. Update frequency depends on public disclosure availability.
transparency.howTag: What does the color tag mean?
transparency.howTagText: The tag color indicates the organization’s donation amount from last year, not its effectiveness or quality.
transparency.selfReportedText: When you click "I've completed my support," this is a self-reported action for your personal tracking only. We:
transparency.cannotVerify: Cannot verify if a donation was actually completed
transparency.doNotKnow: Do not know the amount of any donation made
transparency.storeLocally: Store this information locally on your device only
transparency.useSolely: Use this solely to provide achievement feedback and encourage engagement
transparency.gamificationText: Our achievement system rewards intent and participation, not money. Achievements are designed to encourage exploration and awareness of wildlife conservation causes. They are:
transparency.basedOnActions: Based on user actions on this platform only
transparency.advertisingPolicyText: We display advertisements to support the operation of this platform. Our strict guidelines ensure:
transparency.adsNeverNear: Ads never appear near donation call-to-action buttons
transparency.adsDistinguishable: Ads are clearly distinguishable from donation links
transparency.questionsText: If you have questions about our transparency practices or notice any issues with the information displayed, please fill out the feedback form below. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of accuracy and integrity.

about.title: About WildHeart Bulletin
about.purposeText: WildHeart Bulletin exists to bridge the gap between well-meaning donors and wildlife organizations that urgently need support. In a world with countless worthy causes, we help you identify where your contribution can have the most immediate and meaningful impact.
about.noMiddlemanText: We never handle donations. All contributions go directly to organizations through their official channels.
about.urgencyFocusedText: Our ranking system highlights organizations with the most pressing needs, not just the most popular ones.
about.transparentDataText: All fundraising information comes from publicly available sources and is clearly labeled.
about.privacyFirstText: Your activity stays on your device. We don't track who you are or how much you donate.
about.creatorIntro:
Hi, I’m Han, the creator of WildHeart Bulletin.

I built this website after noticing, through posts on Threads, that many people who are willing to support wildlife conservation care deeply about understanding the fundraising status and needs of different organizations.

Through this platform, I hope to organize and present fundraising information from various wildlife conservation groups, so that those who want to take action can direct their donations to the teams that need support the most and align best with their own values.

My goal is to make donation information more transparent, helping people support wildlife conservation in a clearer, easier, and more reassuring way.

transparencyBanner.message:
This platform does not process donations or track donation amounts.

Fundraising data sources: general donation information is collected from publicly available content on each organization’s official website or social media pages; regulated fundraising data is sourced from the Ministry of Health and Welfare’s Public Fundraising Management System.

Rankings based on donation or fundraising amounts do not represent the importance or value of any organization and are provided solely for reference purposes.
